songs.title: Get Some
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You get up
You get coffee
You get paid
You get off
You get gas
You get beer
You get drunk
You get weird
You get drove home
You get up thrown
You get hungry
You get chicken
Your guitar needs picking
You get tan
You get pale
You get sick
You get well
You get dressed up
You get messed up

[Chorus]
Everybody say, God Almighty it's Friday
Everybody get sideways to have a little fun
Everybody's living
Everybody's trying
Everybody's dying
To get some

[Verse 2]
You get lost
You get saved
You get waxed
You get shaved
You get high, real high
Forget your next line
You get drive-thru, dollar menu

[Chorus]
Everybody say, God Almighty it's Friday
Everybody get sideways to have a little fun
Everybody's living
Everybody's trying
Everybody's dying
To get some

[Guitar]

[Verse 3]
You get the girl
You get the one
You get her home
You get her done
You get hitched
You get mad
She gets a lawyer
She gets half
You get banged up
You got to raise up
That red Dixie cup

[Chorus]
And everybody say, God Almighty it's Friday
Everybody get sideways to have a little fun
Everybody's living
Everybody's trying
Everybody's dying to get some
Everybody's dying to get some
Dying to get some
